natSpec.notice:
Set the sharing percentages between incentivePool receiver contracts. Percentages must sum
  to 100%.

param._percentagePerReceiverBips: An array of sharing percentages in bips.

natSpec.notice:
Set the annual incentivePool percentage schedule. This schedule is meant to be set for recognition
  a per-annum basis.

param._annualIncentivePoolScheduleBips: An array of incentivePool percentages in bips.

natSpec.dec:
Once the schedule has been used up, the last percentage
  yielded will be the percentage that will continue to be yielded.

natSpec.notice:
Get the next annual incentivePool percentage from the schedule and pop it off the schedule.
  If there are no percentages remaining within the schedule, yield the last percentage known.
natSpec.dec: Note that it is up to the caller to call this function at the appropriate annum interval.

natSpec.notice: Get the incentivePool receiver contracts and the current sharing percentages.

Set the sharing percentages between incentivePool receiver contracts. Percentages must sum
  to 100%.

param._percentagePerReceiverBips: An array of sharing percentages in bips.

natSpec.notice:
Implementation of the AddressUpdatable abstract method - updates IncentivePool 
and incentivePool receivers contracts.

Set the annual incentivePool percentage schedule. This schedule is meant to be set for recognition
  a per-annum basis.

param._annualIncentivePoolScheduleBips: An array of incentivePool percentages in bips.

natSpec.dec:
Once the schedule has been used up, the last percentage
  yielded will be the percentage that will continue to be yielded.
